TopicTitle: 100 ways to get kicked out of wallmart

Articles.Content: 444: Live in England, because there is no Walmart in England
Walmart owns our Asda stores now :/

FREAKing Wallmart. I bet it'll be the first supermarket on Mars. Carrefour will have to stick with the Moon and regret it, because only united-statens go there.

Edited April 27, 2014 by BadLeo
Morals
We run a family friendly forum here BadLeo, please try to remember that.

Geroge Carlin was family friend... I guess. Anyways I'll watch my manners.

445. Aply to a position on it and at the job interview, refers to it by only pun names: Wallmars, Wallmartir, Wall-E, Waldo, The Wall, Wallmaraton...

Edited April 27, 2014 by BadLeo
Forgot to apologize for being an immoral bast... oh dear...
446. Ask an employee if you could talk to Larry. Insist that a "Larry" does work there and you want to talk to him.

447: Don't go to Walmart in the first place

447.5: Decide 447.0 was a bad idea and crash your car into the front doors of Walmart because you need something FAST.

447.6. "LARRY! DRIVE THROUGH CLEANUP ON AISLE FIVE!"

448. Play the derp song on the PA system (or whatever the speaker system is)

449. Play Bethoven's Ode to Joy

on their PA sys.

Edit: 449.5 Play it live. With the exact outcome.

Edited April 28, 2014 by BadLeo
450: take all the flour and dump it all over the floor evenly, then take a sled and pretend to "go sledding"
451: Rob the store with a banana.

452: Open all the water bottles and stick a small chocolate bar inside each one. (Then, of course, you close the lids before anybody notices.)

Edited May 21, 2014 by Noname117
453: Run around screaming: "FEEEED ME, FEEEEEEED ME!"
454 :Throw A pound of ground meat at the CEO and run.
455: Run around hitting people over the head with black puddings.
456: Stand at the entrance dressed like an employee and hand out merchandise as "free samples."
457: Nukes... 'nuff said
458: Eat a cat in front of the cashier, who is also the Walmart representative to PETA.
459: Put down your pants in the mart and show everyone your weener.
460: Hack into the speakers and try to sing.
461: Steal the twinkies. Nuff said.
462: Take a huge dump on the checkout thing and try to get a price for the crap.

I have 3 ways:

463: acting like you are another costumers overly clingy child, but your not actually their child.

464: tape a walkie talkie to a Barbie doll, and then speak to random people in a overly creepy voice saying "I KNOW WHERE YOU LIVE!!!"

465:dress up in a trench coat and wear sun glasses, walk up to a customer browsing and say "the rooster is in the nest". wait for a reply. after they finish talking, hand them a cap gun and then say "use this wisely"

Edited June 13, 2014 by gooddog15

466: Scream as loud as you can, and then put on the most innocent face and say: "Oopsie..."

467: Hire a Mariachi band to follow the store manager for a whole day.
